name: Abryl
content:
Abryl was a male humanoid Sith Lord who served the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War against the Galactic Republic. He was stationed in Kaas City, the capital of the planet Dromund Kaasâ€”center of the Sith Empire. Working as a vendor of special items, he wore armor underneath his robes and a mask covering his face, and also carried a lightsaber.
Abryl first appeared on Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing video game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. He appears in the marketplace of Kaas City as a Legacy items vendor.
